0: I also used the the fitness facilities which were adequate for a hotel
Nice gym with multiple machines and free weight dumbbells
I enjoyed the facility such as workout room and the bar was ok
The lobby and facilities and bar restaurant were very appealing
For SPG elite members the Executive Lounge always has a decent selection of appetizer and finger foods during Managers Reception time
it is convenient and has excellent facilities for swim jacuzi or workout
Comfortable hotel with all the amenities standard to a Sheraton fitness center small pool with hot tub club lounge free guest wifi for Starwod members
Very good accommodations for business meetings and presentations
It was our 21st wedding anniversary and this was our venue for both our wedding and reception
1: Hotel is kind of dark downstairs large lobby with little day light
Currently has the lobby restaurant and shop under renovation
2: It felt like we were in her own home and not just a lobby restaurant

I was looking for a place to spend the night next to the airport so I can leave in the following morning and I was at the end of a hallway room 250 and there was so much noise someone going in and down the stairwell all night that it kept me awake
I could hear everytime the elevator bell rang
I arrived at 11 PM and walked in the lobby and was at the front desk by myself and was with the night front desk person
The closet was right by the entrance yet its doors were designed so they do not get in the way of entering or exiting
The lobby and the guest rooms have been redone
We were not there long enough to use all the facilities
Only stayed one night but was impressed with the newly renovated rooms and lobby
The walk to the hotel rooms from the lobby is still a bit of a drain as one has to drag their suitcase down a long hallway on a too plush rug that catches the suitcase
3rd that is when they suggested I talk to maintenance to learn how to use thr elevators
